Test.Name: #1896: initial AutoFocusMode=MANUAL
#1896: initial AutoFocusMode=AUTO
#1896: not possible to set invalid settings - only Focus in Options
#1896: not possible to set invalid settings - all Options
#1896: Focus options have NearLimit
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for BacklightCompensation
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for Brightness
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for ColorSaturation
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for Contrast
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MinExposureTime
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MaxExposureTime
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MinGain
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MaxGain
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MinIris
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for MaxIris
#1896: it is possible to set invalid settings only for ExposureTime
#1896: script for reporter's log (BacklightCompensation enabled)
#1896: script for reporter's log (BacklightCompensation disabled)
